entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
